title: How to Add a Facebook Account to a Mac: Connect Facebook to macOS

steps.title: Open Safari or your preferred web browser.
steps.content: Open Safari or your preferred web browser. If you want to add your Facebook account to your Mac, you can sign in to Facebook a web browser. The option to add a Facebook account to System Preferences was removed in macOS Mojave, so signing in to Facebook in a web browser is now the only way to add a Facebook account to your Mac. If you're still using macOS High Sierra or earlier, see this method to learn how to add a Facebook account.

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com . Type the address into the address bar at the top of your web browser, then press Return to open the Facebook login page.

steps.title: Enter your login details and click Log In.
steps.content: Enter your login details and click Log In . You can log in using the email address or phone number associated with your account. Once your password is accepted, you'll be signed in to Facebook. If you've forgotten your Facebook password , click the Forgot password? link to reset it.

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com in your web browser and sign in.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com in your web browser and sign in. While you can't instantly sync all of your Facebook events to your Mac's calendar, you can easily export events from Facebook and add them to your calendar individually. [1] X Research source Start by signing in to your Facebook account in a web browser like Safari or Chrome.

steps.title: Click Events.
steps.content: Click Events . This is in the left menu. You may need to click See more if Events isn’t listed.

steps.title: Click Your Events.
steps.content: Click Your Events . This displays events you've created , attending , and invited to.

steps.title: Select the event you want to add to your Mac's calendar.
steps.content: Select the event you want to add to your Mac's calendar. You'll need to export each event individually.

steps.title: Click the three dots and select Add to calendar.
steps.content: Click the three dots and select Add to calendar . You'll see the three horizontal dots at the top-right corner of the event.

steps.title: Select "Add to Calendar" and click Export.
steps.content: Select "Add to Calendar" and click Export . This prompts you to download an .ics file that contains the event info. If the file doesn't download automatically, choose a location on your Mac and save it.

steps.title: Open the Calendar app on your Mac.
steps.content: Open the Calendar app on your Mac. This displays your calendar.

steps.title: Import the file you downloaded from Facebook.
steps.content: Import the file you downloaded from Facebook. You can do this by dragging the file ending in .ics anywhere onto the Calendar window, or by clicking File > Import and selecting the file. [2] X Research source You'll be asked to select a calendar.

steps.title: Select your calendar and click OK.
steps.content: Select your calendar and click OK . This adds the Facebook event to your Mac's calendar.

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com in your web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com in your web browser. There's no longer an easy way to sync your Facebook contacts to your Mac. This function has even been removed from your iPhone and iPad. Instead, you can use this manual method to look through your friends list on Facebook and adding their contact information to the Contacts app on Mac.

steps.title: Click Friends in the left panel.
steps.content: Click Friends in the left panel. You'll see it toward the top-left corner of your feed.

steps.title: Click All Friends.
steps.content: Click All Friends . This option is in the left panel. Now you'll see a list of all of your Facebook friends.

steps.title: Click the friend you want to add to your Mac contacts.
steps.content: Click the friend you want to add to your Mac contacts. This will take you to their profile page in the right panel. You can open their profile page in a new tab so you don’t lose your place in the friends list.

steps.title: Click the About tab your friend’s profile page.
steps.content: Click the About tab your friend’s profile page. This will open the About section of your friend’s profile.

steps.title: Click Contact and basic info.
steps.content: Click Contact and basic info . This option is located in the list below “About.” On the right side of the About page, you’ll now see your friend’s contact information that they’ve listed on Facebook. You can add this information manually to your Mac's Contacts app.

steps.title: Open the Contacts app on your Mac.
steps.content: Open the Contacts app on your Mac. It’s an icon of a person in a circle with a brown background. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click the Add button.
steps.content: Click the Add button. This is the plus icon (+) located near the bottom of the Contacts app.

steps.title: Enter the contact information.
steps.content: Enter the contact information. Use the information on your friend’s profile page to fill in the fields in the new contact menu. You don’t have to complete every field.

steps.title: Click Done.
steps.content: Click Done . This will save the contact to your Mac.

steps.title: Click the Apple menu.
steps.content: Click the Apple menu. If you're using macOS 10.13 or older , you can add your Facebook account to your Mac in System Preferences for easy integration. First, click the Apple logo in the menu bar. Note that this method only works for macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) and earlier. Facebook was removed from later versions of the macOS Internet Accounts feature.

steps.title: Click System Preferences.
steps.content: Click System Preferences . If you don't see the System Preferences option, click the Show All button, which has 12 dots in a grid pattern.

steps.title: Click Internet Accounts.
steps.content: Click Internet Accounts . It has a white “@” icon on a blue background. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click the Facebook logo.
steps.content: Click the Facebook logo. This will start the account integration process. If you don’t see Facebook as an option, click Add Other Account at the bottom of the list. Then, select the type of account and enter in the account details.

steps.title: Type your Facebook account name and password.
steps.content: Type your Facebook account name and password. Your account name might be the email associated with your Facebook account.

steps.title: Review the information that will be synced.
steps.content: Review the information that will be synced. You'll be shown the content that will be synced with your Mac computer.

steps.title: Click Sign In to confirm.
steps.content: Click Sign In to confirm. This will add the Facebook account. Your Facebook and Mac are now connected. If you use Instagram, you can also connect your Instagram and Facebook accounts .

steps.title: Select the Facebook features you want integrated.
steps.content: Select the Facebook features you want integrated. These features will appear as a list of checkboxes on the right side of the Internet Accounts menu. These can be changed later if needed! Click the Contacts box to toggle contact syncing. When this is enabled, Facebook contacts will appear in your Contacts app. Click the Calendar box to toggle Facebook events. When this is enabled, Facebook contacts will appear in your Contacts app. Unchecking this box will prevent those contacts from syncing.
